Pre-Game Insights: Andrew Jett will lean toward the Royals but could probably go either way.
Wacha is rolling along nicely these days with just four earned in 19.0 innings over his last three starts. He’s 3-0 in that trio.
As for Bibee, he’s doing well also with six earned over his last 16.1 innings in three starts. Bibee is just 1-2 in his last three, though.
I think the Royals will be fine though.
